title: Budjerri Dyillagami: Peggeralin
brief_description: A video artwork by Ngarigo artist Peter Waples-Crowe in collaboration with Glynn Urquhart.

constellations_other.name: Broadcasting marginal voices
constellations_other.description: The creation of Indigenous broadcasting in Central Australia from the late 1970s meant an array of diverse Black stories could be shared. Today, important stories told by those who physically and metaphorically live on the margins can be broadcast widely.

description: A video artwork by Ngarigo artist Peter Waples-Crowe in collaboration with Glynn Urquhart.
description_for_label: A video artwork by Ngarigo artist Peter Waples-Crowe in collaboration with Glynn Urquhart.
